name: The Clown (itch)
description:
The game was made for NaNoReNo 2013, and will no longer be updated.

Play as an unnamed female narrator as you suddenly wake up in a dark room,
and move around to find yourself in a circus theater where you will witness probably one of the most disturbing things in your life. (Or so we say.)

Features:

  • file size is more or less 25mb,
  • play time only 5-10 minutes, depends on your reading speed
  • choices that doesn't affect the ending (kinetic/linear visual novel)
  • best played on 800x600 resolution
  • badly-timed public domain circus music!

Future plans:
- polish the piece
- add bonus material

Statistics:
The game contains 118 screens of dialogue.
These screens contain a total of 1,860 words,
for an average of 15.8 words per screen.
The game contains 3 menus.

Credits:
Writing/Programming/Design: notyourleo
Art/Co-Design: hazelle more ([link])
Textures: punk-rose.com
